body:
can you add a test:

pred = np.array([1, 0, 0]).reshape((3, 1))
a = np.random.randn((3, 4))
b = np.random.randn((3, 4))

out = self.evaluate(pred, a, b)

assertAllClose(out, np.where(pred, a, b))
